entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
